hero.title: Explore China–Brazil trips
hero.subtitle: Routes, visa tips and best seasons

sections.introTitle: Designed for travelers between China and Brazil
sections.introBody: Travel Web helps you understand seasons, must-see spots and cultural tips so you can plan confident trips between China and Brazil.
sections.why1: Curated routes created from a China–Brazil perspective, not generic copy-paste guides.
sections.why2: Simple overviews of seasons, visas and local transport so you don’t get lost in details.
sections.why3: Clean, ad-free interface that focuses on what you really need to decide your next trip.
sections.destinationsBrazilChina: Classic China ⇄ Brazil highlights – big cities, iconic landmarks and first-time routes.
sections.destinationsCityBreaks: City breaks with food and culture – from São Paulo to Shanghai and beyond.
sections.destinationsNature: Nature and slow journeys – mountains, coasts and small towns off the usual path.
sections.aboutBody1: Travel Web is a personal project built to explore how to create and maintain a real-world travel website.
sections.aboutBody2: It focuses on routes between China and Brazil and uses modern web tools, so the site can grow and evolve over time.
